modName: Fantasy Heroine - Female Face Texture UNP CBBE v2.0b
summary: The detail of Mature Skin by Maevan2...the smoothness of Better Females by BellaGail...a blend of realism and fantasy for your female character. Compatible with UNP and CBBE bodies.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://orig13.deviantart.net/0494/f/2015/276/a/d/fhbanner_by_auriv1-d9bt262.png[/img]
[/center]

[u][b]Name: Fantasy Heroine[/b][/u]
Version: 2.0b
Date: 10/03/2015
Category: Models and Textures
Author(s): AurianaValoria1, BellaGail, zzjay, Maevan2, and bhaktisean
Source: SkyrimNexus


[center][size=3]Just putting this out there to make it clear:

[b][i]I will not grant anyone else permission to port my Skyrim mods to SSE. I will do it myself when I have the inclination and the opportunity.[/i][/b]

I'm sorry if this decision disappoints you, but I would like to be responsible for my own mod pages and how the mods behave in the game.

I have no idea how my mods for Oldrim will work in SSE, even after conversion, and I want to have a proper handle on that [i]myself [/i]before I put them out there for other people to use in their games.[/size]

[size=3]Thanks,[/size]
[b][font=Georgia][color=#B45F06][size=3]Auri[/size][/color][/font][/b][/center]

Details
========
I have been a long-time user of Better Females by Bella, and I just recently discovered Maevan2's wonderful Mature Skin. Despite the fact that I enjoyed the detail of Maevan's face texture, I still missed the smoothness of Bella's work. Thus, this female face texture was born from my desire to blend the best of both worlds.

[u][b]This mod REQUIRES Maevan2's Mature Skin to display on your character properly! [/b][/u]The reason being that this file only includes the femalehead.dds file. You will need Mature Skin for the proper normal maps and body texture for no neckseam.

[u][b]**Install Maevan's mod first, then this one!*** [/b][/u]

This face texture has been tested with both the CBBE and UNP versions of the body textures with very minor neckseams perceived in both cases. Blending programs may help with this. I do not know about other body types such as ADEC...any feedback would be appreciated.

I do realize that Bella's textures are not pleasing to everyone; this mod was made with the purpose of mixing fantasy and reality.

[center][img]http://orig12.deviantart.net/7c9e/f/2015/276/f/f/fhfrontpage2_by_auriv1-d9bt23n.png[/img][/center]

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)SkyrimData


Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the files associated with the mod.


Incompatibility
===============
Any other mod that replaces femalehead.dds.

History
=======
1.0, 2014/02/08 - Initial release.
1.0, 2014/05/02 - Added Simple Beauty Edition.
1.0, 2014/06/03 - Added Smooth Edition.
1.0, 2015/01/18 - Added Lunari textures and 2k and 4k versions of the 3 base texture options.
2.0b, 2015/10/03 - Updated to match Maevan's latest textures; [u][b]Smooth Edition and Simple Beauty Edition support removed.[/b][/u]

Contact
=======
Comment or send me a PM.

Credits
=======
Thanks to BellaGail and Maevan2, upon whose textures this file is based.
Thanks to zzjay for her Natural Edition version of Better Females, which was used in the creation of the Simple Beauty Edition and the Smooth Edition.
Thanks to bhaktisean for allowing me to upload altered versions of the Lunari Race textures.

zzjay's credits, copied as per permissions:
BellaGail
Xenius
Navetsea
Neckros
-dimon99 for: dimonized unp body
-Caliente for: CBBE body
-nuska for: High res female nord snormalmaps

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.

**NOTE: Screenshots created with Project ENB**

Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
GIMP - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=14920
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
This mod is not to be uploaded to any other site for any reason, regardless of whether or not you can contact me. This mod contains the work of Maevan2, zzjay, and BellaGail - please respect their wishes regarding the use of their work.
